title: A third of Canadians hospitalized for COVID-19 under age 40 - Toronto Star

content: Almost one third of the people in hospital for COVID are under the age of Canada s chief public health officer says I am reminding Canadians not to underestimate the severity of this disease Dr Theresa Tam told a news conference Saturday noting chars
